fields.name: IgnoreCertificateNameMismatch
fields.description: The value indicating whether to ignore mismatch in certificate name.

fields.name: KeepHTTPConnectionAlive
fields.description: The value indicating whether to keep the connection alive.

fields.name: SupportHTTPStatusCodeContinue
fields.description: The value indicating whether to support HTTP status code 'CONTINUE'.

fields.name: UnfoldHTTPHeaders
fields.description: The value indicating whether to unfold the HTTP headers.
